Package com.ibm.caas

Android API to request content from a MACM server.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CAASDataCallback<T>
    Callback handler invoked once the server's response has been received.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CAASAssetRequest
    Request implementation for fetching images, PDF files or other assets from the server and returning them as byte arrays that can be converted to appropriate types for the Android platform.
    CAASContentItem
    Instances of this class represent content items retrieved from the server.
    CAASContentItemRequest
    A request object for querying details of a single content item.
    CAASContentItemsList
    Instances of this class provide access to a list of items resulting from a request, along with access to the properties of this list.
    CAASContentItemsRequest
    A request object for querying a list of content items.
    CAASErrorResult
    Encapsulates the error result of a failed query.
    CAASRequest<C>
    Abstract super class common to all requests.
    CAASRequestResult<C>
    Encapsulates the result of a request.
    CAASService
    Implementation of the service which communicates with the server to authenticate and retrieve content.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CAASContentItemsRequest.WorkflowStatus
    Possible values for the workflow status.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CAASException
    Exception raised when a CaaS service operation fails.

Package com.ibm.caas Description

Android API to request content from a MACM server.
